title: TCG Player

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You draw a hand of 5 cards at the beginning of the game. After drawing your hand, you may choose to mulligan, drawing a new hand of 4 cards. You may repeat this process any number of times, drawing one less card each time.
- Cards are random roles from the Grand Idea Mafia roles thread.
- Your opening hands will always contain at least 2 killing roles.
- You draw an additional card at the beginning of each day.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Each night, you may play a card as either a creature or a sorcery.
- If you play it as a creature, create a new player with that role named whatever you want at the beginning of the next day. You control that player.
- If you play it as a sorcery, use any number of its abilities and gain any number of its attributes that night, then it goes to the Graveyard.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate all who would oppose you.
